DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Test Results Biospecimen Source Type Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A coded value specifying the origination source of the entity.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A coded value specifying the origination source of the entity._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
